name: Pipe Hero Infinite [DEMO]
description:
DEMO for Pipe Hero Infinite.

CURRENT VERSION - Alpha 9.0.1 as of 4/9/2020.

Use pipes, junctions, pumps, and more to manipulate the flow of water through a machine.

If you have any suggestions or if you find something you think is a bug please let me know!

Puzzles are implemented up to puzzle group 4. Puzzles in group 4 are likely to be tweaked or changed a lot, puzzles up to group 3 are for the most part done. Group 5 is not yet built, and attempting to play it will crash you probably.

Save data + progression data are saved in your local app data.

Further updates, bug fixes and content addition will be logged here / in the dev logs for the game.
